name: Supplier Payment voucher Report
query:
SELECT 
PE.name As "PaymentNo:Link/Payment Entry:100",
PE.posting_date As "InvoiceDate:Date:100",
PE.payment_type as "PaymentType:Data:100",
PE.party_type as "PartyType:Data:100",
PE.party_name as "PartyName:Data:100",
PE.party as "CustomerNO:Link/Customer:100",
PE.party_name as "CustomerName:Data/Customer:100",
PE.physician as "DoctorNo.:Link/Doctor:100",
DOC.first_name as "DoctorName:Data:120",
PE.paid_amount as "Paid Amount:Currency:120"
from `tabPayment Entry` as PE 
inner JOIN `tabDoctor` DOC 
on DOC.NAME = PE.physician
WHERE PE.docstatus = 1
and PE.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
and PE.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
and PE.party_type = 'Supplier'
and (PE.physician = %(physician)s or %(physician)s = 'all' )
UNION ALL
SELECT 
PE.name As "PaymentNo:Link/Payment Entry:100",
PE.posting_date As "InvoiceDate:Date:100",
PE.payment_type as "PaymentType:Data:100",
PE.party_type as "PartyType:Data:100",
PE.party_name as "PartyName:Data:100",
PE.party as "CustomerNO:Link/Customer:100",
PE.party_name as "CustomerName:Data/Customer:100",
PE.physician as "DoctorNo.:Link/Doctor:100",
null as "DoctorName:Data:120",
PE.paid_amount as "Paid Amount:Currency:120"
from `tabPayment Entry` as PE 
WHERE PE.docstatus = 1 
and PE.physician is null
and PE.posting_date >= %(from_date)s 
and PE.party_type = 'Supplier'
and (PE.physician = %(physician)s or %(physician)s = 'all')
